alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 1:41AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Scott and northern Polk Counties through 215 AM CST... At 140 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Polk County Fairgrounds, or near Mena, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mena... Hatfield... Polk County Fairgrounds... Mena Intermountain Airport... Acorn... Board Camp... Nunley... Ink... Cherry Hill in Polk County... Potter... Dallas... Shady Grove... Camp Pioneer... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for western Arkansas.
